definition: to stick/to affix/to adhere/to paste (as in "copy and paste")/Taiwan pr. [nian2 tie1]/also written 黏貼|黏贴[nian2 tie1]
to glue/to paste/to adhere/to stick to
to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip

sentences.english: The stewards had stuck sticky labels on the cargo.
sentences.chinese: 乘务员已经将粘性标签粘贴在货物上了。

sentences.english: Pastes previously copied or cut clipboard contents.
sentences.chinese: 粘贴先前复制或剪切的剪贴板内容。

sentences.english: Another option is a stick-on, anti-glare shield .
sentences.chinese: 还有一个选择就是购买可粘贴的防反光贴膜。

sentences.english: Sometimes stick-on nails are the only way to go.
sentences.chinese: 有时候粘贴上去的假指甲也有同样的效果哟。

sentences.english: Cut two small, curved ears from brown construction paper and glue them near the top of the mask.
sentences.chinese: 用棕色工作用纸剪出两个耳朵，并粘贴在面具上方。

sentences.english: Blue-Light Phone – Brightly-colored phone posts with a blue light bulb on top.
sentences.chinese: 电话顶端粘贴一个蓝色的小灯泡。
它是一种简单的复制粘贴Job。

sentences.english: She had my stickers in her mouth!
sentences.chinese: 它用嘴叼着我的粘贴画。

sentences.english: Copy and paste the code below.
sentences.chinese: 第三步，复制粘贴下面代码。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the adhering and arranging effect of the automobile glass can be enhanced.
sentences.chinese: 再进一步地，可增强汽车玻璃的粘贴安装效果。

sentences.english: Reasons for quality problems of adhesive bond between cork sheets and composite cabin are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了引起复合材料舱体软木粘贴质量问题的原因。

sentences.english: It can be cut, pasted and remixed.
sentences.chinese: 它可以剪切，粘贴和混合。

sentences.english: Hope that every patriotic Patriots, with three seconds of the time you paste, copy.
sentences.chinese: 希望每一位爱国义士，用你们3秒的时间粘贴，复制。

sentences.english: We can stick these pictures into the book with gum.
sentences.chinese: 我们可用胶水把这几张画粘贴在书里。

sentences.english: Then we work with the plaster and lath to construct the extra sections of wall; this takes a very long time.
sentences.chinese: 随后就把塑胶和木板粘贴到墙上，这要花很长时间。

sentences.english: Paste the copied code into this new agent.
sentences.chinese: 将之前复制的代码粘贴到这个新代理中。

definition: to glue to/to paste onto/to stick on/also written 粘貼|粘贴[zhan1 tie1]
